about_the_game:
This pack unlocks Armored Mr. Ping as a playable character. It also comes with an alternate Jombie skin for Master Oogway.
  • New playable character. Mr Ping has embraced the tournament and he puts on his Noodle Shop pots and pans armor.
  • New character skin. Play as Jombie Master Oogway.
detailed_description:
This pack unlocks Armored Mr. Ping as a playable character. It also comes with an alternate Jombie skin for Master Oogway.
  • New playable character. Mr Ping has embraced the tournament and he puts on his Noodle Shop pots and pans armor.
  • New character skin. Play as Jombie Master Oogway.

fullgame.name: Kung Fu Panda Showdown of Legendary Legends

name: Kung Fu Panda: Armored Mr. Ping and Jombie Oogway

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3, Windows Vista SP1, Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz Dual core CPU (any Core 2 Duo or AMD X2 or better)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Video Card using Shader Model 3 or higher (Performance equivalent to AMD Radeon 4350 or NVIDIA GeForce 7900)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Any Quad-core Intel or AMD Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB Video Card using Shader Model 3 or higher (Performance equivalent to NVIDIA 9800 or better)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: This pack unlocks Armored Mr. Ping as a playable character. It also comes with an alternate Jombie skin for Master Oogway.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
